buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-emerald-600 text-white font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-[1.02] transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 font-medium hover:bg-slate-50 transition-all

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 rounded-[2rem] p-6 shadow-sm border border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.interactive: cursor-pointer hover:border-emerald-200 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 group

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500/20 focus:border-emerald-500 transition-all

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-6 left-4 right-4 h-16 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/20 shadow-2xl rounded-full flex items-center justify-around z-50

setup: UPDATE tailwind.config.js: Set theme.extend.borderRadius.lg to '2rem', md to '1.5rem', sm to '1rem'.
UPDATE tailwind.config.js: Add colors: emerald (primary), slate (secondary), ice-grey (#F8FAF9).
UPDATE index.css: Import Manrope and Inter fonts.
UPDATE index.css: Set body font-family to 'Inter', headings to 'Manrope'.
INSTALL: lucide-react, framer-motion, clsx, tailwind-merge (if not present).
rules: ALWAYS use rounded-[2rem] for main containers and cards.
NEVER use sharp corners (rounded-none) unless absolutely necessary for a specific grid layout.
USE 'Ice Grey' (#F8FAF9) as the main background color for the app to give it depth.
USE White (#FFFFFF) for cards to create lift.
IMPLEMENT a 'Mobile-First' layout. The desktop view should be a centered mobile-app container or a responsive dashboard.
USE the 'Bottom Navigation' pattern for the main layout.
ENSURE all interactive elements have a 'data-testid' attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
